TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit WebPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指定权限以访问 Internet 资源。

span.span: Specifies permission to access Internet resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你以声明方式指定的 URI 字符串和正则表达式字符串可以使用你的类。 allows you to declaratively specify which URI strings and regular expression strings your class can use. 中指定的安全信息特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储应用。The security information specified in the is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系统访问此信息在运行时。The system accesses this information at run time. 传递给构造函数用于确定允许目标。The passed to the constructor determines the allowable targets. 系统使用返回方法将属性目标的安全信息转换为可序列化的窗体存储在元数据。The system uses the returned by the method to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. > [!NOTE] > 仅用于[声明性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。 is used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8). 有关[命令性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，使用相应。For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用到方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CPP/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/CS/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_AcceptConnect/VB/webpermissionattribute_acceptconnect.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 用指定可在此类上执行的安全操作的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a value that specifies the security actions that can be performed on this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此构造函数的值指定可以对此类执行的允许安全操作。The value passed to this constructor specifies the allowable security actions that can be performed on this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用到方法。The following example demonstrates how to apply to a method. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Constructor/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is not a valid value.

member this.Accept : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前 接受的 URI 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI string accepted by the current .

value.span: 一个字符串，包含当前 接受的 URI。

span.span: A string containing the URI accepted by the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用时到该类，此属性指定将用于您的类中接受什么样的 URI 字符串。When applying to your class, this property specifies what URI string will be accepted for use within your class. 当安全系统调用时应用此权限。This permission is applied when the security system calls . 此属性是可写的后。This property is write-once. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定所允许字符串。The following example demonstrates how to use to specify an allowable string. [!code-cpp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermissionAttribute_Accept#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermissionAttribute_Accept/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 当尝试设置该值时， 不为 。

span.span: is not when you attempt to set the value.

exception.span: 如果希望指定多个 Accept URI，请使用附加的特性声明语句。

span.span: If you wish to specify more than one Accept URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission
abstract member CreatePermission : unit -> System.Security.IPermission override this.CreatePermission : unit -> System.Security.IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由安全系统中，不是由应用程序代码调用方法。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全信息特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储应用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系统访问运行时的信息。The system accesses the information at run time. 系统使用返回要转换的属性目标的安全信息存储在元数据中的可序列化形式。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
